meanings.sent1: I made a typo in my essay and misspelled a word.
meanings.sent2: The book had a typo on page 10, where a letter was missing.
meanings.sent3: The typo in the newspaper article changed 'cat' to 'rat'!
meanings.sent4: Her email had a typo that turned 'meeting' into 'eating'.
meanings.sent5: The important document had a typo that altered its meaning completely.

meanings.sent1: I always seem to typo when I type too quickly.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to typo important information in the report.
meanings.sent3: He managed to typo his own name on the form!
meanings.sent4: She tends to typo more when she's tired and rushing.
meanings.sent5: Try not to typo on the keyboard by hitting the wrong keys.
